abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Sunny Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Rain Castform. (Any cards attached to Rain Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Rain Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Splash
attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Holon Energy card attached to Rain Castform.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Sunny Castform and switch it with Snow-cloud Castform. (Any cards attached to Snow-cloud Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Snow-cloud Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Blizzard
attacks.text: If Snow-cloud Castform has any Holon Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Sunny Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Rain Castform. (Any cards attached to Rain Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Rain Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Scattered Shower
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw up to 5 cards.

attacks.name: Rainy Day Blues
attacks.text: If Low Pressure System is in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Sunny Castform and switch it with Snow-cloud Castform. (Any cards attached to Snow-cloud Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Snow-cloud Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Flurries
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: White Snow
attacks.text: If Magnetic Storm is in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Sunny Castform. (Any cards attached to Sunny Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Sunny Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Holon Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Sunny Castform. (Any cards attached to Sunny Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Sunny Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Sunshine
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

attacks.name: Sunburn
attacks.text: If High Pressure System is in play, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Sunny Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Holon Draw
attacks.text: Draw a card. If Castform has any Holon Energy cards attached to it, draw 2 more cards.

abilities.name: Temperamental Weather
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for Sunny Castform, Rain Castform, or Snow-cloud Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperamental Weather Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Forecast
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Stadium card and play it. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Extra Ball
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.name: Holon's Castform
rules: You may attach this as an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon that already has an Energy card attached to it. When you attach this card, return an Energy card attached to that Pokémon to your hand. While attached, this card is a Special Energy card and provides every type of Energy but 2 Energy at a time. (Has no effect other than providing Energy.)

attacks.name: Delta Draw
attacks.text: Count the number of Pokémon you have in play that has δ on its card. Draw up to that many cards.

data.name: Castform

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) If you do, put Castform on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Weather Ball
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, remove 3 damage counters from Castform. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

data.name: Castform Rain Form

abilities.name: Temperament
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Rain Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Rain Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle Castform Rain Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: The defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Its appearance changes with the weather. Recently, its molecules were found to be just like water.

data.name: Castform

attacks.name: Weather Teller
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Stadium cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: It changes its form depending on the weather. Changes in the temperature or humidity appear to affect its cellular structure.

data.name: Castform Sunny Form

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.text: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon's attack costs.

attacks.name: High-Pressure Blast
attacks.text: Discard a Stadium in play. If you can't, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Castform changes to this form when it basks in bright sunlight. When you touch its glowing skin, it feels all dried out!

data.name: Castform Rainy Form

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.text: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon's attack costs.

attacks.name: Rainfall
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: This is Castform's form when pelted by rain. In an experiment where it was placed in a shower, this Pokémon didn't change to this form.

data.name: Castform Snowy Form

abilities.name: Weather Reading
abilities.text: If you have 8 or more Stadium cards in your discard pile, ignore all Energy in this Pokémon's attack costs.

attacks.name: Frosty Typhoon
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Frosty Typhoon.

data.flavorText: This is Castform's form when caught in a hailstorm. Its whole body is chilled, and its skin is partially frozen!

data.flavorText: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform's disposition!
